original_title: 艶説女侠伝　お万乱れ肌
overview: "After leaving the Yakuza, Oman embraces a quiet normal life - only to be dragged back into a world of violence, when seeking revenge for the brutal murder of those close to her." - Adapted from the late October 1972 issue of Kinema Junpo
title: Foreigner's Mistress Oman: Tempestuous Skin
